content.description: Three words are stored in the variables word1, word2, and word3. The values of the variables are to be updated as shown in the following table.
content.question: VariableValue BeforeUpdatingValue AfterUpdatingword1"xylophone""zebra"word2"yarn""yarn"word3"zebra""xylophone"Which of the following code segments can be used to update the values of the variables as shown in the table?
